content: That's a great point about adding texture and depth to the display. I'm thinking of using some burlap or canvas to create a table runner, and maybe add some pinecones or pebbles to complement the rustic theme. Do you think that would work well with the wooden crates and flowers? And by the way, Emma sold out of her famous heirloom tomatoes by 11 am, which was impressive considering we got there at 6 am to set up.
